ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: Contributions from L.M.F. and W.N.S in this work were performed as part of the activities of the Research Network Natural Products against Neglected Diseases (ResNetNPND), ( http://www.resnetnpnd.org/Start/. Also, this work was supported by CONICYT PIA/APOYO CCTE AFB170007.
